item.description:
TOURNEY

 


Time: 6:30pm
Buyin: $20
Starting Stack: 150,000 chips
One OPTIONAL Rebuy or Add-on: $20 for 150K chips (if player busts before end of lvl 2 they may rebuy once.  If they haven't busted then at the end of lvl 2 they have the option of the add-on.  If you already rebought you may not also receive the add-on)


# of Players: up to 16 players on two tables
Eats: Pizza by 6:45pm, water, soda and snacks provided. Extra fridge if you want to BYOB. Cost of food & drink taken from total prize pool. Remainder paid out to players.

BLIND STRUCTURE - 30 min levels- all amounts in thousands

1/2k

2/4k - Rebuys end/optional add-on available at end of level.

3/6k  -COLOR UP 1K CHIPS-

5/10k

10/20k

15/30k

20/40k

25/50k - Final level, play until winner

Payouts

9 or less players 1st = 60% 2nd = 40%

10-16 players 1st = 50% 2nd = 30% 3rd = 20%

 

OTHER NOTES


- smoking at the bottom stairs of the deck please (will have a can there for butts)
- coats can go on the back of your chair (not on couch please)
- we have cats in case you suffer from allergies!
- you may wear your shoes inside, we'll swiffer the floors after the event

 

ADDRESS


2 Omelia Rd, East Windsor

Anthony's Home Phone: 860-292-8983
Anthony's Cell Phone: 860-597-3776


- house is on the corner of a four-way intersection with Rye Street. Big brick building, large yard. Driveway is between the yellow fire hydrant and the mailbox (there's also a bench by the tree next to the mailbox) Please park near my silver Camry. Come in through side door at deck!

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: $20 Deepstacked NL Texas Hold Em Poker Tournament @ Anthony's
